sentences.english: He's fairly representative of young Syrian men in a secular society.

sentences.english: Jesus teaches us how to live in the present time.

sentences.english: QinFuYin, a narrative long epic, has been attracting researchers'eyes since it had been discovered.

sentences.english: The most damaging aspect of contemporary living is short-term thinking.
sentences.chinese: 现世生活最可怕的就是只顾目前。

definition: to be born/to come into being/to withdraw from worldly affairs
